name: Balor General
description: The Balor General is a huge fiend with a formidable presence, radiating chaotic evil. It possesses a fiery aura and is characterized by its impressive combination of slashing and lightning attacks, wielding both a lightning sword and a fire whip.
memorable: Its explosive Death Throes ability and the capability to teleport make it a highly dangerous opponent that can shift the tide of battle.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and instill fear in opponents, leveraging its powers of fire and lightning.
relations: May be encountered alongside other demons or serve as a general for dark forces.
environment: Often found in chaotic planes or battlefields rife with destruction.
strengths: High mobility and versatility in combat with multiple attacks and powerful area effects.
weaknesses: Can be defeated through concentrated efforts and strategic planning due to its reliance on powerful abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a lightning sword for melee strikes and a fire whip that can pull enemies closer, along with area effect attacks involving fire and thunder.
most_powerful_ability: Death Throes, which causes an explosive fire damage effect when it dies.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and perceive hidden foes.
skills: High proficiency in intimidation, enhancing its ability to instill fear in others.
additional_information: Immunity to fire and poison damage, and resistance to cold and lightning damage.
Legendary Resistance allows it to negate failures on saving throws.
Can take two reactions per round, increasing its response capability during combat.
